httpreq.hfile

Summary
Details

This module defines the HTTPRequest intrinsic class. This class represents a request sent from a network client to the byte-code program via the program's HTTP server object. See the HTTPServer object for details on setting up an HTTP server within the program. HTTPRequest objects are not created with 'new'. Instead, the system creates them when HTTP requests arrive, and returns them to the byte-code program via the netEvent() built-in function.
